test.name: Scenario: Validate if the emails in the comments are properly formatted

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=jsonplaceholder, url=https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Given that I search for the username "Delphine"
kw.source_name: that I search for the username "${user}"

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users?username=Delphine path_url=/users?username=Delphine headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: When I use the id fetched to search for the posts written by the user
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts?userId=9 path_url=/posts?userId=9 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

iter.var: {'userId': 9, 'id': 81, 'title': 'tempora rem veritatis voluptas quo dolores vero', 'body': 'facere qui nesciunt est voluptatum voluptatem nisi\nsequi eligendi necessitatibus ea at rerum itaque\nharum...

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

{'userId': 9, 'id': 87, 'title': 'nostrum quis quasi placeat', 'body': 'eos et molestiae

iter.var:
